question_text: Which figure will this net make?
backend_description: Shows a net consisting of connected rectangles arranged in a cross pattern. The net has rectangular faces that would fold up to form a 3D shape. Students need to identify whether this creates a triangular or rectangular prism.
question_type: Multiple Choice Question with Single Answer
image_choice_tags_backend_description: Shows a green triangular prism - a 3D shape with triangular bases on the ends and rectangular faces connecting them.
Shows a green rectangular prism (box shape) - a 3D shape with rectangular faces on all six sides.
solution: Imagine folding this net along the dotted lines.
This net makes a rectangular prism.
